# EntityTargetValue

**Structure**

A value containing an original gesture value along with a targeted entity.

## Declaration

```swift
@dynamicMemberLookup struct EntityTargetValue<Value>
```

## Overview

Spatial data from a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/DragGesture/Value/location] returned by a gesture can be converted to and from the entity using functions defined in [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/RealityCoordinateSpaceConverting].

For example, here’s how to convert [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/DragGesture/Value/location] from a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/DragGesture] to the parent of an [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/Entity]:

```swift
DragGesture(coordinateSpace: .global).targetedToEntity().updating($state) { state, value, _ in
    let location = value.convert(
        value.location, from: .global, to: value.entity.parent
    )
    ...
}
```

## Accessing gesture info

- **entity**: The targeted entity.
- **gestureValue**: The gesture value updated by the gesture.
- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**

## Instance Methods

- **unproject(_:from:to:)**: Unproject `point` from a 2D coordinate space into 3D world coordinates.
- **unproject(_:to:)**: Unproject a 2D point from the gesture value into 3D world coordinates.

## Direct and indirect gestures

- **Transforming RealityKit entities using gestures**: Build a RealityKit component to support standard visionOS gestures on any entity.
- **InputTargetComponent**: A component that gives an entity the ability to receive system input.
- **ManipulationComponent**: A component that adds fluid and immersive interactive behaviors and effects.
- **GestureComponent**

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- RealityCoordinateSpaceConverting
- RealityCoordinateSpaceProjecting
